product_name: Grabber Peel N' Stick Body Warmer
long_description: Place the heat where you need it most. Apply this air-activated Grabber Peel N' Stick body warmer for relief of aches and pains, as well as a chill. Packet heats for up to 12 hrs. at an average 127degF; simply stick the warmer to an inner layer of clothing. Grabber body warmer is made with environmentally safe, nontoxic materials. Ingredients: iron, water, activated carbon and salt. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Place the heat where you need it most. Apply this air-activated Grabber Peel N' Stick body warmer for relief of aches and pains, as well as a chill.
